author: bjh
msg: Fix up configure hints for OS/2:
- config.guess returns "i386-pc-os2_emx" so test for that. It's uname that
- CFLAGS, LDFLAGS & LIBS are set just fine by configure without any hints

author: dreid
msg: BeOS doesn't have a native MMAp, but there the ap_mmap functions have
been written and work just fine.  This allows us to tell APR that this is
the case and have the APR_HAS_MMAP flag set accordingly.
